entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 a.m. CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
